name: Khora
description: Khora is red in whip and claw. She works together with her Kavat companion, Venari, to deal high damage and provide crowd control. Two bodies, one will.

abilities.name: Whipclaw
abilities.description: Send enemies reeling with a deafening whipcrack. Stats are boosted by the equipped mods on Whipclaw.

abilities.name: Ensnare
abilities.description: Bind a hapless target in living metal, entangling others who stray too close. Whipclaw will refresh the trap allowing it to capture more enemies.

abilities.name: Venari
abilities.description: Command Venari to focus on a target. Hold to cycle between Attack, Protect, and Heal postures. If Venari is killed, use this ability to revive her instantly.

abilities.name: Strangledome
abilities.description: Weave a dome of living chain that ensnares and strangles any enemy within, and any foolish enough to approach. Foes outside the trap will try to hasten their comrade's deaths by shooting them. Crack Whipclaw on the dome to further damage any trapped enemies.

languages.description: Khora färbt ihre Peitsche und Klaue. Zusammen mit ihrer Kavat, Venari, verursacht sie hohen Schaden und bietet Gruppenkontrolle. Zwei Körper, ein Wille.
languages.name: Khora

languages.description: Khora est tout en fouet et en griffe. Elle travaille avec son compagnon Kavat, Venari, pour infliger des Dégâts importants et assurer le contrôle des foules. Deux corps, une seule volonté.
languages.name: Khora

languages.description: Khora, la sanguinaria con frusta e artigli. Lavora con il suo compagno Kavat, Venari, per infliggere danni elevati e controllare la massa. Due corpi, una volontà.
languages.name: Khora

languages.description: 코라는 야생의 무자비함처럼 채찍과 발톱을 휘두릅니다. 그녀는 자신의 카밧 동반자, 베나리와 나란히 함께 싸우며, 이를 통해 높은 피해를 가하고 군중 제어 효과를 제공합니다. 두 개의 몸에 담긴, 하나의 의지입니다.
languages.name: 코라

languages.description: Khora, la sanguinaria con látigo y garras. Trabaja junto con su compañera kavat, Venari, para infligir mucho daño y proporcionar control de masas. Dos cuerpos, una voluntad.
languages.name: Khora

languages.description: Khora 有着血染的鞭子和爪子。她与她的库娃同伴薇娜丽，合力造成高伤害并提供群体控制。双身同心。
languages.name: Khora

languages.description: Воительница с окровавленными когтями и хлыстом. Она работает вместе со своим компаньоном-каватом Венари, чтобы наносить большой урон и обеспечивать контроль над толпой. Два тела, одна воля.
languages.name: Кора

languages.description: Khoraが鳴らす鞭は主の意思表示である。相棒キャバットのVenariと共に高いダメージを与え敵を制圧する。
languages.name: Khora

languages.description: Khora posiada karminowy bat i szpony. Ona i jej wierny Kavat, Venari, współdziałają, by zadawać wysokie obrażenia i zapewnić kontrolę nad tłumem. Dwa ciała, jedna wola.
languages.name: Khora

languages.description: A Khora é a incorporação do chicote e da garra. Ela trabalha com sua companheira Kavat, Venari, para causar alto dano e fornecer controle de grupo. Dois corpos, uma só vontade.
languages.name: Khora

languages.description: Khora 以血色之姿握持長鞭和利爪。她與她的庫娃同伴──薇娜麗，協力造成高傷害並提供群控。兩心一意。
languages.name: Khora

languages.description: Khora มีลำตัวสีแดงโดยใช้แส้และกรงเล็บเป็นอาวุธ ทำงานร่วมกันกับ Venari คู่หู Kavat เพื่อสร้างความเสียหายสูงและใช้สกิล CC คอยควบคุมศัตรู มีสองร่างกาย แต่ความตั้งใจเดียวกัน
languages.name: Khora

languages.description: Khora, kırbaç ve pençelerle kana bulanır. Yüksek hasar vermek ve kitle kontrolü sağlamak için Kavat arkadaşı Venari ile birlikte çalışır. İki beden, tek irade.
languages.name: Khora

languages.description: Воїтелька із закривавленим батогом і кігтями. Хора разом із каватицею Венарі завдає великої шкоди та керує натовпом. Два тіла, проте одна душа.
languages.name: Хора
